Literature.Title: Machine learning designs non-hemolytic antimicrobial peptides.
Literature.Author: Capecchi A, Cai X, Personne H, Köhler T, van Delden C, Reymond J-L

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=4µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ZEM1.A(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ZEM9.A(MIC=64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA14(MIC=2µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA14(MIC=2-8µg/ml),Stenotrophomonas maltophilia(MIC=4µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae(MIC=8µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae NCTC 148(MIC=>64µg/ml),Burkholderia cenocepacia(MIC=>64µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=16µg/ml)
